name: svelte-drag-and-drop
author: Fabiano CÃ©sar <fcfabiano.cesar@gmail.com>
description: The Drag and Drop API is a lightweight and customizable library that enables developers to easily implement drag-and-drop functionality within web applications. It simplifies the process of making elements draggable and droppable, supporting a variety of use cases such as sortable lists, file uploads, and UI components management.
